rules.description: Crossover timing - Cancel cross-hand shortcuts within 80ms

manipulators.description: Right-hand j pressed within 80ms of left-hand HRM
Right-hand k pressed within 80ms of left-hand HRM
Right-hand l pressed within 80ms of left-hand HRM
Right-hand semicolon pressed within 80ms of left-hand HRM
Left-hand a pressed within 80ms of right-hand HRM
Left-hand s pressed within 80ms of right-hand HRM
Left-hand d pressed within 80ms of right-hand HRM
Left-hand f pressed within 80ms of right-hand HRM

rules.description: Home row mods - a (ctrl) - pinky finger

manipulators.description: Typing streak - output 'a' if recently typed
Same-hand stacking - instant mod when left mod IS ACTIVE (not just pressed)
Default HRM - tap for 'a', hold for control

rules.description: Home row mods - s (opt) - ring finger

manipulators.description: Typing streak - output 's' if recently typed
Same-hand stacking - instant mod when left mod IS ACTIVE (not just pressed)
Default HRM - tap for 's', hold for option

rules.description: Home row mods - d (cmd) - middle finger

manipulators.description: Typing streak - output 'd' if recently typed
Same-hand stacking - instant mod when left mod IS ACTIVE (not just pressed)
Default HRM - tap for 'd', hold for command

rules.description: Home row mods - f (shift) - index finger (fast, shorter streak)

manipulators.description: Typing streak - output 'f' if recently typed (shorter window for shift)
Same-hand stacking - instant mod when left mod IS ACTIVE (not just pressed)
Default HRM - tap for 'f', hold for shift

rules.description: Home row mods - j (shift) - index finger (fast, shorter streak)

manipulators.description: Typing streak - output 'j' if recently typed (shorter window for shift)
Same-hand stacking - instant mod when right mod IS ACTIVE (not just pressed)
Default HRM - tap for 'j', hold for shift

rules.description: Home row mods - k (cmd) - middle finger

manipulators.description: Typing streak - output 'k' if recently typed
Same-hand stacking - instant mod when right mod IS ACTIVE (not just pressed)
Default HRM - tap for 'k', hold for command

rules.description: Home row mods - l (opt) - ring finger

manipulators.description: Typing streak - output 'l' if recently typed
Same-hand stacking - instant mod when right mod IS ACTIVE (not just pressed)
Default HRM - tap for 'l', hold for option

rules.description: Home row mods - semicolon (ctrl) - pinky finger

manipulators.description: Typing streak - output ';' if recently typed
Same-hand stacking - instant mod when right mod IS ACTIVE (not just pressed)
Default HRM - tap for ';', hold for control

rules.description: Typing mode toggle - Right Cmd + Space (with notification)

manipulators.description: Toggle ON with HRM k (right_command) + Space
Toggle OFF with Right Cmd + Space
Toggle OFF with Left Cmd + Space (escape hatch)

rules.description: Track typing activity on non-HRM keys for streak detection
Hyper Key: Caps Lock -> hyper mode (variable only)
Mac OSX: double-tap right shift key -> caps lock toggle
Change hyper+hjkl to arrow keys and navigation
